effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Blade Dance and Chaos Strike by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Blade Dance and Chaos Strike have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Winning Streak! persists for 8 sec after being removed by Blade Dance or Chaos Strike.

Entering demon form sacrifices all Winning Streak! stacks to gain 2% critical strike chance per stack consumed. Lasts 15 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cursed Vision of Sargeras

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Blade Dance deals 20% increased damage.
(4) Set: Chaos Strike deals 12% increased damage, and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Blade Dance and reduce its Fury cost by 30%.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Blade Dance and Chaos Strike by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Blade Dance and Chaos Strike have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Winning Streak! persists for 8 sec after being removed by Blade Dance or Chaos Strike.

Entering demon form sacrifices all Winning Streak! stacks to gain 2% critical strike chance per stack consumed. Lasts 15 sec.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 2.2 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 15,260 Agility for 15 sec.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
